experiences.title: Community Cork Full Stack Web Application
experiences.description:
This is a Neumont College of Computer Science Collaborative Enterprise Project.
Students are tasked with working in a team-based project environment to work with companies and do what is required of us.
My team and I are developing a web-based application that gives users access to events in the area.
This application also coincides with another app which is the ZIING mobile application.

experiences.title: Neumont College of Computer Science - Event Coordinator
experiences.location: 143 Main St, Salt Lake City, UT, 84111
experiences.description: Work to ensure that student life on campus is fun and enjoyable by setting up engaging events.
